span.span: Represents the strip lines on a chart.

summary.span: 获取或设置带状线的渐变样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the gradient style of the strip line.

value.span: 枚举。

span.span: A enumeration.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定是否图表元素渐变，以及的方向渐变，如果使用将显示。The property determines whether a chart element will display a gradient, as well as the orientation of the gradient, if used. 若要使用渐变颜色：To use gradient colors: - 使用属性来设置主要颜色。Use the property to set the primary color. - 使用属性来设置辅助颜色。Use the property to set the secondary color. - 将此项设置为所需的渐变样式的图表元素的属性。Set this property of the chart element to the desired gradient style. 此属性不适用如果属性设置为值为 0.0。This property is not applicable if the property is set to a value of 0.0.

span.span: Gets or sets the hatching style of the strip line.

value.span: 枚举。

span.span: A enumeration.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 阴影图案由纯色背景色和背景上绘制的直线组成。The hatch pattern consists of a solid background color and lines drawn over the background. 中的阴影样式使用的两种颜色的设置方法是和属性。The two colors used in the hatch style are set by the and properties. 此属性不适用如果属性设置为值为 0.0。This property is not applicable if the property is set to a value of 0.0.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ BackImage { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置带状线的背景图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the background image of the strip line.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示图像文件的 URL。

span.span: A value that represents an image file URL.

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性定义许多图表元素的背景图像路径，是一个绝对或相对 URL。The property defines a path to a background image for many chart elements, and is an absolute or relative URL. 若要定位此图像，请使用和属性。To position this image, use the and properties. 你还可以指定一种颜色将为"透明"的映像显示的设置属性。You can also specify that one color will be displayed by the image as "transparent" by setting the property. 图像可以是任何支持的.NET Framework，包括图标的有效图形文件。An image can be any valid graphics file supported by .NET Framework, including icons. 此属性不适用如果属性设置为值为 0.0。This property is not applicable if the property is set to a value of 0.0. 背景图像优先于其他后台属性，如渐变颜色。Background images take precedence over other background properties, such as gradient colors.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartImageAlignmentStyle BackImageAlignment { System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartImageAlignmentStyle get(); void set(System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartImageAlignmentStyle value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置背景图像对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the background image alignment.

value.span: 一个 枚举值。

span.span: A enumeration value.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性确定条带线; 的背景图像的对齐方式它是仅应用的在属性设置为。This property determines the alignment of the background image for strip lines; it is only applied when the property is set to . 有关可用对齐方式的详细信息，请参阅枚举主题。For more information about available alignments, see the enumeration topic.

summary.span: 获取或设置带状线背景图像的颜色，该颜色将实现为透明效果。

span.span: Gets or sets the color of a strip line background image that will be implemented as transparent.

value.span: 一个将显示为透明效果的 值。

span.span: A value that will be displayed as transparent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性不适用如果属性设置为值为 0.0。This property is not applicable if the property is set to a value of 0.0.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartImageWrapMode BackImageWrapMode { System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartImageWrapMode get(); void set(System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartImageWrapMode value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置带状线的背景图像的绘制模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the drawing mode of the background image of the strip line.

value.span: 一个 整数枚举。

span.span: A integer enumeration.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性确定图像的显示方式;也就是说，平铺缩放后，等等。This property determines how the image is displayed; that is, tiled, scaled, and so forth. 如果缩放图像，它将拉伸以适合边界的条带线。If an image is scaled, it will be stretched to fit within the bounding strip line. 如果平铺图像，则从左上角开始，对其重复绘制。If the image is tiled, it is repeatedly drawn, starting from the top-left corner. 有关可用包装模式的详细信息，请参阅枚举主题。For more information concerning the available wrapping modes, see the enumeration topic. 如果属性设置为，绘制图像的位置将由属性设置。If the property is set to , the location where the image is drawn will be determined by the property setting. 此属性不适用如果设置为值为 0.0。This property is not applicable if is set to a value of 0.0.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Color BackSecondaryColor { System::Drawing::Color get(); void set(System::Drawing::Color value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Web.UI.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartColorEditor, System.Web.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 获取或设置带状线背景的辅助颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the secondary color of the strip line background.

value.span: 一个 值，该值用于带阴影或渐变填充的背景的辅助颜色。

span.span: A value used for the secondary color of a background with hatching or gradient fill.

value.span: 默认颜色为 。

span.span: The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性确定在很多的图表对象的辅助背景色，并在应用渐变颜色时使用。This property determines the secondary background color of many chart objects, and is used when gradient colors are being applied. 你可以设置为任何有效的 ARGB alpha、 红色、 绿色 (蓝色） 值的背景辅助颜色。You can set background secondary color to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. 如果使用阴影，则属性确定阴影线的颜色。If hatching is used, the property determines the color of the hatching lines. 若要使用的图表元素背景渐变颜色：To use gradient colors for the background of a chart element: - 使用属性来设置主要颜色。Use the property to set the primary color. - 使用此属性来设置辅助颜色。Use this property to set the secondary color. - 设置为所需的渐变样式的属性。Set the property to the desired gradient style. 此属性不适用如果属性设置为值为 0.0。This property is not applicable if the property is set to a value of 0.0.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Color BorderColor { System::Drawing::Color get(); void set(System::Drawing::Color value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置带状线的边框颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the border color of a strip line.

value.span: 一个 值。

span.span: A value.

value.span: 默认颜色为 。

span.span: The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以将此属性设置为任何有效的 ARGB alpha、 红色、 绿色 (蓝色） 值。You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. 如果属性对象设置为 0.0，将绘制一条线，以及它是此属性而不属性设置将确定线条的颜色。If the property of a object is set to 0.0, a line will be drawn, and it is this property and not the property setting that will determine the color of the line.

span.span: A enumeration value that determines the border style of the strip line.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指定用于边框的线条样式。This property specifies the line style used for a border. 线条可以是实线、 虚线或实线和虚线的某些变体。The line can be solid, dotted or some variation of solid and dotted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性以像素为单位。This property is measured in pixels.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double StripWidth { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置带状线的宽度。

span.span: Gets or sets the width of a strip line.

value.span: 一个 值，该值确定是绘制条带还是线条。

span.span: A value that determines whether a strip or a line is drawn.

value.span: 默认值为 0.0。

span.span: The default value is 0.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性不能设置为小于 0.0 的值，否则，将引发异常。This property cannot be set to a value less than 0.0, otherwise an exception will be raised. 设置为 0.0 会导致正在绘制; 的线条此行将使用，和其颜色、 宽度和样式的属性设置。A setting of 0.0 will result in a line being drawn; this line will use the , and property settings for its color, width and style. 没有任何`Back*`中此类的属性都处于使用状态时的值为 0.0。None of the `Back*` properties in this class are utilized when the value of is 0.0. 如果你设置属性大于 0.0 的值，将创建一个条。If you set the property to a value greater than 0.0, a strip will be created. ，和属性仅适用于边框的条带; 的所有`Back*`属性则用于栏的背景属性。The , and properties only apply to the border of the strip; all of the `Back*` properties are then used for the background properties of the strip. 如果值属性为大于 0.0，单位由相关轴刻度。If the value of the property is greater than 0.0, the units are determined by the relevant axis scale.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType StripWidthType { System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType get(); void set(System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 属性的度量单位。

span.span: Gets or sets the unit of measurement for the property.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，该值指示宽度类型。

span.span: A enumeration value that indicates the width type.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性确定所使用的单位属性。This property determines the units used for the property. 例如，若要设置条带线来表示"一周"，你无法设置此属性为并设置属性设成一个 (1.0)。For example, to set a strip line to represent "one week", you could set this property to and set the property to one (1.0). 你可以更改从此属性的值到值时相关的轴刻度使用值。You can change the value of this property from to a value when the relevant axis scale uses a value.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示带状线的文本。

span.span: A value that represents the text of a strip line.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示带状线文本的对齐方式。

span.span: A value that represents the alignment of the strip line text.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::TextOrientation TextOrientation { System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::TextOrientation get(); void set(System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::TextOrientation value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置文本方向。

span.span: Gets or sets the text orientation.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示文本方向的对齐方式。

span.span: A value that represents the alignment of the text orientation.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ToolTip { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置带状线的工具提示。

span.span: Gets or sets the tooltip of a strip line.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示带状线的工具提示。

span.span: A value that represents the tooltip of the strip line.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设置此属性时，将自动创建一个客户端图像映射，并将使用 Title 属性设置为指定的工具提示字符串创建的地图区域。If you set this property, a client-side image map will automatically be created, and a map area will be created with the Title attribute set to the specified tooltip string. 映射区将使用对应于条带线的尺寸。The map area will use the dimensions that correspond to the strip line. 设置此属性将产生任何影响，如果属性设置为`false`。Setting this property will have no effect if the property is set to `false`. 默认值为 true。The default value is true.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Url { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Web.UI.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.UrlValueEditor, System.Web.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 获取或设置带状线的目标 URL 或定位点。

span.span: Gets or sets the destination URL or anchor point of the strip line.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示带状线的目标 URL 或定位点。

span.span: A value that represents the destination URL or anchor point of the strip line.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要使用绝对 URL，请以“http://”或“www.”开始字符串表达式。To use an absolute URL, start the string expression with either "http://" or "www.". 如果字符串不是以上述前缀之一开始，则会被视为相对 URL。If the string does not start with either of these prefixes, it will be treated as a relative URL.
